title: Riot support not responding
body: I had sent a ticket out about some of my problems and they never responded and its been over 4 days now, so if someone could get on it that would be nice

replies.body:
Response times to support tickets can vary depending on how big the ticket queue is. Our teams are hard at work getting back to folks, so I recommend continuing to be patient while they reach out to you when they're available. Avoid replying to or "bumping" your ticket, as it sends it to the back of the queue and lengthens the time it takes for someone to get back to you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Is there an issue with the support system? Before it would take a day now its been taking me almost a week to get a reply
Same i sent one 5 days ago and never gotten a response
